book.synopsis: The murder of Colonel Protheroe, a much-hated magistrate, brings Miss Marple to St. Mary Mead to wade through the scandal and dirty secrets exposed by the crime. Reissue.
book.title_long: Murder at the Vicarage (Miss Marple Mysteries)
book.dimensions: Height: 6.5 Inches, Length: 4 Inches, Weight: 0.25 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
